incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays & Failures to MTN (Spacetel) in Yemen

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN (Spacetel) in Yemen. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN (Spacetel) in Yemen. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to MTN (Spacetel) in Yemen. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Deactivation of status.twilio.com component 'MMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks'

incident_updates.body:
Dear Twilio customer,

You’re receiving this notification because you’ve been identified as a status.twilio.com user who is subscribed to the component 'MMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks' under the section 'External Connectivity' and 'Carrier Network'.

Please note that Twilio will be deactivating the component 'MMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks' by April 10, 2023.

Any future incident or maintenance communication regarding MMS delivery notifications and status callbacks will be shared service specific via the following carrier network components:
• MMS Toll Free, North America
• MMS Long Code, North America
• MMS Short Code, North America

Please visit https://status.twilio.com and update your preferred notification components via the 'Subscribe To Updates' link located in the top right corner. No action is required to proactively unsubscribe from the component 'MMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks'.

Please reach out to Twilio Support if you have any questions.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

scheduled_maintenances.name: Deactivation of status.twilio.com component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks'

incident_updates.body:
Dear Twilio customer,

You’re receiving this notification because you’ve been identified as a status.twilio.com user who is subscribed to the component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks' under the section 'External Connectivity' and 'Carrier Network'.

Please note that Twilio will be deactivating the component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks' by April 10, 2023.

Any future incident or maintenance communication regarding SMS delivery notifications and status callbacks will be shared service specific via the following carrier network components:
• SMS, APAC
• SMS, Europe
• SMS, Middle East & Africa
• SMS, Latin America
• SMS Toll Free, North America
• SMS Long Code, North America
• SMS Short Code, North America

Please visit https://status.twilio.com and update your preferred notification components via the 'Subscribe To Updates' link located in the top right corner. No action is required to proactively unsubscribe from the component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks'.

Please reach out to Twilio Support if you have any questions.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Beeline

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 10 April 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 10 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice & SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from from 11 April 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 11 April 2023 at 20:00 PDT.. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and there could be intermittent call disconnects to and from a subset of France Twilio’s numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
05 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 05 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
